articles.description: The episode happened in 1984 when the all-rounder was dropped for the Kolkata Test against England. Back then, it was reported that Kapil was dropped for his poor performance.
articles.content: Former Indian captain Sunil Gavaskar recently celebrated the 50th anniversary of his India debut. The batting legend, who represented India for the first time in 1971 against West Indies, continues t… [+2838 chars]
